row.post_process: :SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_WINDOWS.PRV.VARA.TEMP.LIST_TASKS_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &process_flag# = 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS", , "REP", , "COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*","*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : IF &LINE# = "=== end output ===" : SET &process_flag# = 0 : ENDIF : IF &process_flag# = 1 : SET &IMAGENAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 1) : SET &IMAGENAME# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&IMAGENAME#, '"', "") : SET &PID# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 2) : SET &PID# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&PID#, '"', "") : SET &SESSIONNAME# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 3) : SET &SESSIONNUM# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 4) : SET &MEMUSAGE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, 5) : SET &MEMUSAGE# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&MEMUSAGE#, '"', "") : SET &ret# = ISNUMERIC(&PID#) : IF &ret# = "Y" : PUT_VAR &variableName#, &PID#, &IMAGENAME#, &SESSIONNAME#, &SESSIONNUM#, &MEMUSAGE# : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &LINE# = "=== begin output ===" : SET &process_flag# = 1 : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :PSET &UC4RB_LIST_TASKS# = "&variableName#"
